title: Obtain American Community Survey Summary File Data Tables from Census Bureau FTP Site (for EJ analysis, etc.)
text: ACSdownload package R functions helping download parse raw data files United States Census Bureau dataset called American Community Survey (ACS) 5-year summary file. particular, package allows obtain block group tract-level data US States/DC/PR, rather one State one County time, specified variables specified tables. contrast, tools acs package tend provide limited subsets one US County State time, working block group tract resolution tables, /require obtain key Census. Key functions include get.acs() download parse specified data, various helper functions.

title: Utility to Clean Names of States for get.acs — clean.mystates
text: mystates Character vector, optional. Defines states, using 2-character abbreviations (case-insensitive), '' available. Default '' 50 states plus DC, LONGER PR (& , GU, MP, UM, VI, US). mystates specified '' returns default. mystates specified, returns defaults match mystates. mystates includes DC, PR, US, returned, "" "GU" "MP" "VI" removed, "UM" removed. One element vector can 50, 51, 52, 50 represents 50 states, 51 = 50 plus DC, 52 = 51 plus PR. words, default written c(50,'DC','PR') c(51,'PR') just 52. Redundant entries dropped, e.g., c(51,'DC') becomes 51. testing Logical value, optional, FALSE default. LIMITS STATES DC DE TRUE.

title: Utility to Clean Names of States for get.acs — clean.mystates
text: Returns character vector 2-character State abbreviations, lower case.

title: Utility to Clean Names of States for get.acs — clean.mystates
text: FTP ACS Summary files returned function's default:  #53         60              American Samoa                #54         66 GU                        Guam                #55         69 MP    Northern Mariana Islands                #58         78 VI         U.S. Virgin Islands                #57         74 UM U.S. Minor Outlying Islands Note: function stops mystates found full list includes , returns excluding five , invalid state like 'ZQ' causes error invalid state like 'VI' silently removed without error. Puerto Rico (PR, FIPS 72), District Columbia (DC, 11), 50 States ACS 2016-2020 Census 2020. info Island Areas, see https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/decennial-census/technical-documentation/island-areas-censuses.html 2020 Island Areas Censuses (IAC) include data American Samoa (, FIPS 60), Guam (GU, 66), Commonwealth Northern Mariana Islands (MP, 69), U.S. Virgin Islands (VI. 78), U.S. Minor Outlying Islands (UM, 74). 2020 Census counted people living U.S. Island Areas using long-form questionnaire. surveys, American Community Survey (ACS), conducted Island Areas. Therefore, Census Bureau used long-form questionnaire meet Island Areas’ data needs demographic, social, economic, housing unit information. long-form questionnaire similar ACS questionnaire used 50 states, District Columbia, Puerto Rico. 2020 IAC Demographic Profile Summary File provides access data. provides data place, county subdivision, estate (USVI ) level - block groups. 2020 IAC Demographic Profile Summary File data available Census Bureau’s data exploration platform, data.census.gov. 2020 IAC Demographic Profile Summary File located U.S. Census Bureau’s file transfer protocol (FTP) server https://www2.census.gov/programs-surveys/decennial/2020/data/island-areas/. easiest way start 2020 Island Areas Censuses Data Products webpage www.census.gov/programs-surveys/decennial-census/decade/2020/planning-management/release/2020-islandareas-data-products.html

title: Download (if necessary) and merge GEO files for ACS — get.read.geo
text: Uses download.geo() read.geo(), cleanup. Note finds geographic file folder already, download even file corrupt. Read compile geo data entire USA PR DC, takes time entire USA: 2 10 minutes, depending. Remaining fields geo: "STUSAB"   "SUMLEVEL" "GEOID"    "FIPS"     "KEY" NOTE: really need GEOID KEY. GEOID redundant, might useful joining shapefiles/ boundaries Also, specify "NAME" field geo files dropped - might useful takes lots RAM encoding S panish characters Puerto Rico caused problem Mac OSX. NOTE CENSUS: ACS Summary File GEOID contains necessary information connect TIGER/Line Shapefiles, needs modified order exactly match . Notice ACS GEOID, 05000US10001, contains TIGER/Line GEOID string, 10001. order create exact match GEOIDs, necessary remove characters including letter S ACS Summary File. removing characters, new GEOID ACS Summary File exactly matches field GEOID TIGER/Line Shapefiles.

Research using NHGIS data cite :  Minnesota Population Center. National Historical Geographic Information System: Version 2.0. Minneapolis, MN: University Minnesota 2011. IPUMS National Historical Geographic Information System: Version 16.0 dataset. title: Read and Parse NHGIS.org ACS Data Files and Codebooks - not tested or updated — nhgis
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{   x <- nhgis(data.dir = '~/Desktop/nhgis0009_csv')   # save state data as csv   write.csv(x$states$data, file='statedata.csv', row.names = FALSE)   # Which geolevels were found (and what years)?   summary(x)   t(cbind(sapply(x, function(y) y[c('geolevel', 'years')])))   summary(x[['counties']])   # Which Census Bureau tables were found?   x[['states']]$tables   # See the data for one State   t(x[['states']]$data[1, ])   # How many counties are in each State?   dat <- x[['counties']]$data   cbind(sort(table(dat$STATE)))   # How many counties have population > 1 million, for each State?   cbind(sort(table(dat$STATE[dat$B01001.001 > 1E6])))   } # }
